name: Yoga
description: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice that originated in ancient India.

name: Pilates
description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method that focuses on core strength, flexibility, and body awareness.

name: Zumba
description: Zumba is a dance fitness program that combines Latin and international music with fun and effective workouts.

name: Spinning
description: Spinning, also known as indoor cycling, is a high-intensity workout performed on stationary bikes.

name: Kickboxing
description: Kickboxing is a martial art that combines elements of boxing and karate for a challenging and intense workout.

name: Barre
description: Barre is a workout that combines ballet-inspired movements with elements of Pilates, dance, and yoga.

name: CrossFit
description: CrossFit is a high-intensity fitness program that combines weightlifting, cardio, and bodyweight exercises.

name: Aerial Silks
description: Aerial silks is a circus art that involves performing acrobatic moves and poses on suspended fabric.

name: Boxing
description: Boxing is a combat sport that involves punching and defensive techniques for improving fitness and self-defense skills.

name: HIIT
description: HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) is a workout method that alternates between short bursts of intense exercise and recovery periods.

name: Salsa Dancing
description: Salsa dancing is a popular Latin dance style that involves energetic movements, rhythmic footwork, and partner interaction.

name: Body Pump
description: Body Pump is a weight-based group fitness program that targets all major muscle groups using high-repetition exercises.
